        achieve is_on(tv) # Turn on the TV

To turn on the TV using the remote control, you need to grab the remote control, point it at the TV,
 and press the power button on the remote.

Goal Representation:
plaintext
def is_remote_control(x:item):
    return grabbable(x) and has_switch(x)
    
behavior grab_remote_control(remote_control:item):
    body:
        achieve_once inhand(remote_control)
        
behavior point_remote_control_at_tv(remote_control:item, tv:item):
    body:
        achieve facing(remote_control, tv)
        
behavior press_power_button(remote_control:item):
    body:
        achieve is_on(television_248)
        
behavior __goal__():
    body:
        # Step 1: Ensure the remote control is grabbed
        bind remote_control: item where:
            id[remote_control] == 2052 and is_remote_control(remote_control)
            
        grab_remote_control(remote_control)
        
        # Step 2: Ensure the remote control is pointed at the TV
        bind tv: item where:
            id[tv] == 248 and is_television(tv)
            
        point_remote_control_at_tv(remote_control, tv)
        
        # Step 3: Ensure the power button is pressed
        press_power_button(remote_control)
